entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:51 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:18 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 01:45 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: NW 29 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or ice pellets changing to snow this evening and ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
